Title: Indian Summer
Plot: Peggy is given a difficult assignment. Roger's work problems provide new opportunities for Don, and Pete grows more frustrated. Betty finds a new outlet for her growing dissatisfaction.
GuestStars: Aaron Hill, Maggie Siff, Bryan Batt, John Cullum, Talia Balsam, Anne Dudek, Rebecca Creskoff, Adam Kaufman, Joel Murray, Jay Paulson, Andy Umberger, Aaron Hart, Julie McNiven, Bess Rous
